system.effect: Space Brothel. Allows crew to select from various pleasures and satisfy their desires. Often looked down on by Imperial Bureaucracies. Permenant +2 Morale and +10 to all Charm and Commerce tests conducted on the vessel if the Sensorium is used. One per Vessel.
